summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department; authorizing payment of back pay, benefits and certain damages to Heidi Durham, Teri Back, Megan Cornish, Jody Olvera, Angel Arrasmith, Letha Ann Neal, Daisy Jones, and Jennifer Gordon and establishing six additional electrical helper positions in the Lighting Department in accordance with the order of the Hearing Panel in case No. AQ-165; authorizing payment of certain legal fees in connection therewith; and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
